feed.title: Jia Liu
feed.subtitle: Jia Liu is an Associate Professor of Marketing and affiliated Associate Professor in IEDA at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). Her research spans consumer behavior modeling, big data analytics, recommendation systems, revenue management, global branding, and AIGC in business.
